articles.title: Renee Zellweger to Return for ‘Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy’ With Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson - Variety
articles.description: Renée Zellweger is set to return to one of her most beloved roles in Universal Pictures’ and Working Title’s "Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy."
articles.content: Two-time Oscar winner Renée Zellweger is set to return to one of her most beloved roles in Universal Pictures’ and Working Title’s “Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy,” an adaptation of Helen Fielding’… [+2061 chars]

articles.title: Scrabble: Mattel launches new version of game which is 'less competitive' - BBC.com
articles.description: Mattel says the new board is designed to be accessible for those who find word games intimidating.

articles.author: Alex Ritman
articles.title: Paul Mescal, Spike Lee, Olivia Colman Donate Items to Cinema for Gaza Auction as Fundraising Efforts Top $100,000 - Variety
articles.description: The Cinema for Gaza auction has so far raised more than $113,000 for healthcare organization Medical Aid for Palestinians.
articles.content: Donations from the likes of Spike Lee, Paul Mescal and Olivia Colman have been added to a growing list of items being sold off as part the Cinema for Gaza auction, which has so far raised over £90,00… [+1797 chars]
